languages.text: "Паутина моей души была рассечена на сотни нитей. Каждый раз, погибая, я теряла нечто важное. Незримое. Но когда осталась одна Кибелла, одна я... паутина начала сплетаться вновь. Ее узор уже никогда не будет прежним, но она хранит в себе память Кибеллы. Мою память".

"The web of my soul was unmade. Every time I died, I lost something important. Something intangible... until finally, there was only me. I am all that is left of Kibellah. Now a new web has been woven from the threads of the old, and though its pattern will never be the same, it still stores Kibellah's memories. My memories."
languages.original_text: "Паутина моей души была рассечена на сотни нитей. Каждый раз, погибая, я теряла нечто важное. Незримое. Но когда осталась одна Кибелла, одна я... паутина начала сплетаться вновь. Ее узор уже никогда не будет прежним, но она хранит в себе память Кибеллы. Мою память".

traits.locale_text: "The web of my soul was severed into hundreds of threads. With each death, I lost something important. Something elusive. But when there was only one Kibellah left, when I alone was left... the web began to weave back together. And though its pattern will never be the same, it still stores Kibellah's memories. My memories."

"The web of my soul was severed into hundreds of threads. With each death, I lost something important. Something elusive. But when there was only one Kibellah left, when I alone was left... the web began to weave back together. And though its pattern will never be the same, it still stores Kibellah's memories. My memories."

"The web of my soul was unwoven. Every time I died, I lost something important. Something intangible... until finally, there was only me. I am all that is left of Kibellah. Now a new web has been woven from the threads of the old, and though its pattern will never be the same, it still stores Kibellah's memories. My memories."

"The web of my soul was unmade. Every time I died, I lost something important. Something intangible... until finally, there was only me. I am all that is left of Kibellah. Now a new web has been woven from the threads of the old, and though its pattern will never be the same, it still stores Kibellah's memories. My memories."

Now a new web has been woven from the threads of the old, and though its pattern will never be the same, it still stores Kibellah's memories. My memories."

languages.text: «La red de mi alma se deshizo. Cada vez que moría, perdía una parte importante de mi ser. Algo intangible... hasta que finalmente solo quedé yo. Soy lo único que queda de Kibellah. Ahora se ha tejido una red nueva con las hebras rotas de la antigua, y aunque su patrón nunca volverá a ser el mismo, todavía perduran en ella los recuerdos de Kibellah. Mis recuerdos».
languages.original_text: "The web of my soul was unmade. Every time I died, I lost something important. Something intangible... until finally, there was only me. I am all that is left of Kibellah. Now a new web has been woven from the threads of the old, and though its pattern will never be the same, it still stores Kibellah's memories. My memories."

traits.locale_text: «La red de mi alma se deshizo. Cada vez que moría, perdía una parte importante de mi ser. Algo intangible... hasta que finalmente solo quedé yo. Soy lo único que queda de Kibellah. Ahora se ha tejido una red nueva con las hebras rotas de la antigua, y aunque su patrón nunca volverá a ser el mismo, todavía perduran en ella los recuerdos de Kibellah. Mis recuerdos».

languages.text: 「私の魂の網は解かれた。死ぬたびに、大事な何かを失ったわ。形のない何か…最後には、私だけがキベラが残したすべて。今、古い糸から新たな網が織られている。その模様は決して同じものにはならないけれど、キベラの記憶は残されている。そう、私の記憶が」
languages.original_text: "The web of my soul was unmade. Every time I died, I lost something important. Something intangible... until finally, there was only me. I am all that is left of Kibellah. Now a new web has been woven from the threads of the old, and though its pattern will never be the same, it still stores Kibellah's memories. My memories."

traits.locale_text: 「私の魂の網はまだ作られていない。死ぬたびに、大事な何かを失ったわ。形のない何か…最後には、私だけがキベラが残したすべて。今、古い糸から新たな網が織られている。その模様は決して同じものにはならないけれど、キベラの記憶は残されている。そう、私の記憶が」

languages.text: “我的灵魂之网被解开了。每当我死的时候，我都失去了某些重要的东西，某些无形的东西……直到最后，只剩下这样的我，我是绮贝菈的残骸。如今，古老的丝线正在编织着新的罗网。尽管它的图案已不再相同，但它依然保存着绮贝菈的记忆，我的记忆。”
languages.original_text: "The web of my soul was unmade. Every time I died, I lost something important. Something intangible... until finally, there was only me. I am all that is left of Kibellah. Now a new web has been woven from the threads of the old, and though its pattern will never be the same, it still stores Kibellah's memories. My memories."

traits.locale_text: “我的灵魂之网被解开了。每当我死的时候，我都失去了某些重要的东西，某些无形的东西……直到最后，只剩下这样的我，我是绮贝菈的残骸。如今，古老的丝线正在编织着新的罗网。尽管它的图案已不再相同，但它依然保存着绮贝菈的记忆，我的记忆。”

languages.text: "Das Netz meiner Seele wurde entsponnen. Immer wenn ich starb, habe ich etwas Wichtiges verloren. Etwas nicht Greifbares ... bis am Ende nur noch ich übrig war. Ich bin alles, was von Kibellah geblieben ist. Jetzt wurde ein neues Netz aus den Fäden des alten gesponnen, und obwohl sein Muster nie dasselbe sein wird, enthält es doch Kibellahs Erinnerungen. Meine Erinnerungen."
languages.original_text: "The web of my soul was unmade. Every time I died, I lost something important. Something intangible... until finally, there was only me. I am all that is left of Kibellah. Now a new web has been woven from the threads of the old, and though its pattern will never be the same, it still stores Kibellah's memories. My memories."

traits.locale_text: "Das Netz meiner Seele wurde entsponnen. Immer wenn ich starb, habe ich etwas Wichtiges verloren. Etwas nicht Greifbares ... bis am Ende nur noch ich übrig war. Ich bin alles, was von Kibellah geblieben ist. Jetzt wurde ein neues Netz aus den Fäden des alten gesponnen, und obwohl sein Muster nie dasselbe sein wird, enthält es doch Kibellahs Erinnerungen. Meine Erinnerungen."

languages.text: « La toile de mon âme s'est effilochée. Chaque fois que je suis morte, j'ai perdu quelque chose d'important. Quelque chose d'intangible... jusqu'à ce qu'il ne reste plus que celle que vous avez devant vous aujourd'hui. Je suis tout ce qu'il reste de Kibellah. À présent, une nouvelle toile a été tissée à partir des fils de mon passé, et si sa trame ne sera plus jamais la même, elle abrite encore en son sein les souvenirs de celle que j'étais. Mes souvenirs. »
languages.original_text: "The web of my soul was unmade. Every time I died, I lost something important. Something intangible... until finally, there was only me. I am all that is left of Kibellah. Now a new web has been woven from the threads of the old, and though its pattern will never be the same, it still stores Kibellah's memories. My memories."

languages.text: "Ruhumun ağı sil baştan örüldü. Her ölüşümde önemli bir parçamı yitirdim. Soyut parçalarımı... Nihayetinde geriye sadece ben kalmıştım. Kibellah'dan geriye sadece ben kaldım. Eskisinin iplikleriyle yeni bir ağ örüldü. Deseni asla aynı olmayacak olsa da Kibellah'nın anılarını hâlâ içinde barındırıyor. Bunlar benim anılarım."
languages.original_text: "The web of my soul was unmade. Every time I died, I lost something important. Something intangible... until finally, there was only me. I am all that is left of Kibellah. Now a new web has been woven from the threads of the old, and though its pattern will never be the same, it still stores Kibellah's memories. My memories."
